result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert D Muetzel

records.addlTxt: Calendar call on November 9, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Case Called: 9:25 a.m. 
Clerk Heather.
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Defendant FAILS to appear. 

COURT notes Defendant called this morning indicating his health issues are making it impossible for him to appear today.
COURT to vacate BFH and set future dates.

DATES:
CC: 11/9/22 @ 1:00 p.m. 

Adjourned: 9:26 a.m.
Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. Shall have his/her fingerprints and photograph taken at the Sheriff's Dept.

2:29 p.m.
Clerk Micki.

State appears by ADA Sidney Brubacher for ADA Rory McGarry.  Defendant appears in custody from the MCJ via Zoom video, with Attorney Adam Fontana. 

Date and time set for Hearing; VRCW. 
**COURT QUASHES WARRANT**

ADA Brubacher requests $600.00 signature bond with the same non monetary conditions as previously ordered. 

COURT ORDERS: $600.00 signature bond with the same non monetary conditions as previously ordered.

BFH 10/21/22 at 9:00 a.m.

Branch 3.

Date and Time set for Review Hearing.

Clerk Marisa.

COURT makes findings. 
COURT orders bond forfeited and authorizes $400 bench warrant.

Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing on October 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Jury Trial on October 20, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. Prints and photographs.

Clerk: Marisa; Case called: 2:38 pm 
State appears by ADA Rory McGarry; Defendant appears in person, pro se. 
Reading Waived. Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 

PLEA: Not Guilty. 

COURT ORDERS: $300 signature bond - CONDITIONS: 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. 
- Prints and photograph. 

BRANCH 3 CASE. 
PTC with JA: 8/18/2022 at 10:25 am. 
FPT: 9/12/2022 at 3:30 pm.  
Jury Status Review: 9/26/2022 at 10:30 am. 
Jury Trial: 10/20/2022 at 9am.
